name: KC Aero Academy
about: KC Aero Academy, located in Lutz, Florida, is a comprehensive flight school dedicated to providing high-quality aviation training. We offer a range of programs for aspiring pilots, including Private Pilot, Instrument Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor certifications. Our syllabus-based training is structured around online and in-flight instruction, ensuring students have a clear path to their aviation goals. Experienced instructors guide students through discovery flights and hands-on training, providing a thorough and supportive learning environment. At KC Aero Academy, we are committed to helping our students achieve their full potential in aviation.
services:
